text: "I Love It When We Do" is the second single from Irish singer-songwriter Ronan Keating's second studio album, Destination. The single peaked at number five on the UK Singles Chart in September 2002. In 2003, Keating re-recorded the song with additional vocals from French actress and singer Cécilia Cara, re- titled "Je t'aime plus que tout". This version peaked at number 11 in France and number nine in Walloon Belgium. ==Track listing== UK CD1 # "I Love It When We Do" - 3:53 # "Solitary Song" - 3:35 # "I Love It When We Do" (Groove Collision Remix) - 7:12 # "I Love It When We Do" (Video) - 3:55 UK CD2 # "I Love It When We Do" - 3:53 # "Life Is A Rollercoaster" (Live) - 4:17 # "Joy And Pain" (Live) - 4:35 # "Life Is A Rollercoaster" (Live Video) - 4:17 French CD single # "Je T'aime Plus Que Tout" - 3:54 # "I Love It When We Do" - 3:53 ==Charts== ==="I Love It When We Do"=== ====Weekly charts==== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !scope="col"|Chart (2002) !scope="col"|Peak position |- |- |- |- !scope="row"|Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) |24 |- |- |- |- !scope="row"|Romania (Romanian Top 100) |68 |- |- |- |- |} ====Year-end charts==== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !scope="col"|Chart (2002) !scope="col"|Position |- !scope="row"|UK Singles (Official Charts Company) |196 |} ==="Je t'aime plus que tout" (with Cécilia Cara)=== ====Weekly charts==== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !scope="col"|Chart (2003) !scope="col"|Peak position |- |- !scope="row"|Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) |37 |- |- |} ====Year- end charts==== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !scope="col"|Chart (2003) !scope="col"|Position |- !scope="row"|Belgium (Ultratop 50 Wallonia) |53 |- !scope="row"|France (SNEP) |79 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 singles Category:Ronan Keating songs Category:Songs written by Rick Nowels Category:Songs written by Gregg Alexander Category:Song recordings produced by Rick Nowels Category:Song recordings produced by Gregg Alexander Category:2002 songs Category:Polydor Records singles
